meanings.definition: A person who writes or composes odes.
meanings.sent1: The odists in our class enjoy writing poems with a specific structure.
meanings.sent2: The famous odists gathered to share their latest odes at the poetry festival.
meanings.sent3: The odists decided to have a friendly competition to see who could write the best ode.
meanings.sent4: Her words danced on the page like the skilled hands of an odist crafting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The young odists were inspired by the beauty of nature to create heartfelt odes.

meanings.definition: A group of poets who specialize in writing odes.
meanings.sent1: The odists in the poetry club meet every week to discuss their latest works.
meanings.sent2: The odists collaborated on a collection of odes that captured the essence of their shared experiences.
meanings.sent3: The odists jokingly referred to themselves as the 'Ode Squad' to add a touch of humor to their meetings.
meanings.sent4: The odists' words soared like birds in flight, carrying the emotions of their odes to new heights.
meanings.sent5: The odists' dedication to their craft shone through in the intricate details of each carefully composed ode.
